attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anonymous trade vehicles are often driven aggressively and/or dangerously on our roads. 

This situation could be significantly improved if the drivers actions could be attributed by other road users to the company that operates a vehicle.

All trade vehicles should be required to bear signs of the owning company and to display a "How's my driving?" plate.

Where necessary not to identify the owner, for security reasons, just the "How's my Driving?" plate could be allowed.

"Naming and shaming" companies with the most driver complaints would significantly improve road safety.
